name: Square Cosine 2
description:
Controlls AD or Left & Right Arrows - Move Space - Jump R - Reset at last checkpoint

A short platformer made in 3 days for the LOWREZ JAM 2022, where the goal is to get to the top of the map as fast as possible. I added leaderboards to encourage players to get a great time. 

Have fun competing for the first place!

Try out Square Cosine here: https://nitro-gen-studios.itch.io/square-cosine
